data.title: The Poseidon Adventure Original R1974 U.S. One Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1974 re-release U.S. one sheet poster by Mort Kunstler for the film The Poseidon Adventure directed by Ronald Neame / Irwin Allen with Gene Hackman / Ernest Borgnine / Red Buttons / Carol Lynley. Good-Very Good condition, folded with water damage. Many original posters were issued folded or were subsequently folded.
